﻿import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowRight, Sparkles, TrendingUp, Zap, Users, CheckCircle, Search, Menu } from 'lucide-react'; const LandingPage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const features = [ { icon: TrendingUp, title: 'Google Trends Integration', description: 'Real-time trend analysis for hospitality brands and destinations' }, { icon: Zap, title: 'Social Blade Analytics', description: 'Track social media performance of hotels, restaurants, and attractions' }, { icon: Users, title: 'Brand Comparison Tools', description: 'Side-by-side analysis of competing hospitality brands' }, { icon: Sparkles, title: 'Interactive Case Studies', description: 'Real-world hospitality scenarios with live data integration' } ]; const exampleToolkits = [ { id: 1, course: 'HFT 3505', title: 'Social Media & Digital Trends', instructor: 'Dr. Murat Hancer', students: 45 }, { id: 2, course: 'HFT 3444', title: 'Hospitality Information Systems', instructor: 'Dr. Ahmet Ozturk', students: 38 }, { id: 3, course: 'HFT 4464', title: 'Hospitality Industry Finance', instructor: 'Dr. Mehmet Altin', students: 32 } ]; return (
